sioemit

Emit an event to web client.

Syntax

sioemit(name, message)
sioemit(name)

Input argument

name

a string: event name

message

a string: message to emit

Description

sioemit emits an event to client.

Example

sioemit('event_demo', jsonencode(eye(3,3)))

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
